

```{r}
df <- read.csv('./data/visualisation.csv')
```


```{r}
head(df)
```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
boxplot <- ggplot(df, aes(x = explicitness, y = popularity)) +
  geom_boxplot()

boxplot
```

```{r}
df$release_date <- as.Date(df$release_date)

line <- ggplot(df, aes(x = release_date, y = lexical_richness, colour = markets)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.5) +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm") +
  scale_x_date(
    limits = as.Date(c("2000-01-01", "2024-01-01"))
  ) +
  ylim(0, 100)

line
```

```{r}
ggplot(df, aes(release_date, fill = markets)) +
  geom_density(position = "stack")
```
